attributes.action: To Knight Kevin Sinfield for his inspirational efforts to highlight MND
attributes.additional_details: Along with his incredible Rugby League career, he has now run 7 marathons in 7 days to help raise money and raise awareness for motor neurone disease, a shocking ailment that his good friend and former teamate Rob Borrow is now sadly battling. He has raised an incredible amount of money and the whole rugby league community is so proud of him.
attributes.background: To help to award a knighthood to Kevin Sinfield

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
